ygData.subject: Re: Meditation change?
ygData.msgSnippet: What part of Qeynos is this quest and who do I have to talk to to get the quest and what lvl should one be on to do it?  I got the Bloodforge Hammer about a
ygData.messageBody:
What part of Qeynos is this quest and who do I have to talk to to get the
quest and what lvl should one be on to do it? I got the Bloodforge Hammer
about a week ago and it's a pretty good weapon, not the greatest but it's
good. I've heard the Hammer can be sold for 35-70pp. But I'd like to do
this Shining Star of Light if a lvl 18 Cleric can do it (yes still lvl 18,
started a new char the other day trying to get him up in lvls before going
back to Azor).

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> i've had that happen before when i was in cazic....feerrott was down, i
tried to
> zone, and my keys locked too...had to reboot as well.....sounds like a bug
we
> should report....o btw, on the cleric quests, there is a good one in
qeynos for
> the shining star of light....got it tonight...nice weapon.....just wish i
knew
> if clense was random like the yaulp on the screaming mace or something
like
> that....tried right clicking and nothing, so it might be broke at the
> time.....anyone know if that's the case or if it's random? still need me a
good
> shield to use with it tho.....
>
> (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> lv 44 human cleric of The Rathe
